summary: A simple replacer for all Daedric blades; Makes the blade look more alien like Oblivion and Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/357o9bm.png[/img][/center]


This is a simple texture replacer for deadric blades (dagger, sword and great sword) that changes the actual blade from that dull ebony blade to a much more alien and evil look similar to what you would have found in Oblivion or Morrowind.

[youtube]6JuzEuc5rm8&feature=player_detailpage#t=313s[/youtube]

INSTALLATION: Simply extract to your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: Mike_and_ike
